title: Instructional Design Workshop for Anti-Racist Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Blended course combining smartphone-based online learning and offline workshops for pre-service/in-service teachers in healthcare education companies. Focuses on enhancing curriculum design capabilities for anti-racist education to address health disparities

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core principles of anti-racist education and their application in healthcare settings.
Learners can design small-group activities and create discussion guidelines to enhance cultural competence.
Learners can effectively integrate multimedia materials (videos, infographics) for anti-racist education in smartphone-based environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
